q: Do you want unit tests created? (yes/no). If yes, we'll place them under <workspace>/tests.
Do you want to run tests after each task is implemented? (yes/no). This will test each task and retry if tests fail.

Which functions should the prime module include? Reply with the numbers (comma-separated) or 'all'. Options: 1) is_prime(n) -> bool; 2) primes_up_to(n) -> list[int] (all primes <= n); 3) nth_prime(n) -> int; 4) prime_factors(n) -> list[int]; 5) sieve(limit) -> list[int]. If you pick 3 (nth_prime), should it be 0-indexed (nth_prime(0)=2) or 1-indexed (nth_prime(1)=2)? (e.g. '1,2,3 (1-indexed)' or 'all').
